text: The following is the list of squads for each of the 10 teams competing in the EuroBasket 1985, held in West Germany between 5 and 16 June 1985. Each team selected a squad of 12 players for the tournament. ==Group A== ===France=== ===Poland=== ===Romania=== ===Spain=== ===Soviet Union=== ===Yugoslavia=== ==Group B== ===Bulgaria=== ===Czechoslovakia=== ===Israel=== ===Italy=== ===Netherlands=== ===West Germany=== ==References== * 1985 European Championship for Men, FIBA.com. * European Championship 1985 - National Squads, LinguaSport.com. 1985
title: EuroBasket 1985 squads
